description:
Here's a prototype for our 22nd game. It doesn't have a name yet!

We're making this game during the month of May 2021. 
WEEK#1 - Game Design
WEEK#2 (=NOW) - Prototype #1 + testing testing testing
WEEK#3 - Prototype #2 + testing testing testing
WEEK#4 - Final Touch

Get in touch on discord!
